channel.title: Fun on Nicole Siggins
channel.description: Recent content in Fun on Nicole Siggins

item.title: [Upcoming] 2025 - State of the Map US - From map gazing to humanitarian action - My journey through OSM and the world of open mapping
item.description: I’m excited to be presenting at State of the Map US in Boston on June 20, 2025 about my mapping journey.

item.title: WiG Radio - A podcast about being a woman in the geospatial industry ðŸŽ§
item.description: Between 2023 and 2024, I was part of the Women+ in Geospatial mentorship program - cohort 5.

item.title: 2021 HOT Data Quality Internship Program - a self study
item.description: I applied for the 2021 HOT Data Quality Internship.

item.title: Sniffy Dog Game - how many sniffs can you catch? *crunch, crunch*
item.description: I made my first video game as part of the 2019 Pixelles Game Incubator VII Follow Along program.

item.title: 2018 Maptime Berlin - Designing Your Own Print Out Maps for Holiday
item.description: Disclosure: This talk took place before I got into OpenStreetMap, so the tutorial and subsequent maps were built using Google My Maps.
